## Class type

Matches a \[`class`<!-- -->\](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Classes).

 Basic

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Class<T, Arguments extends unknown[] = any[]> = Constructor<T, Arguments> & {prototype: T};
```
